snippet: A statement from aides to Mikhail B. Khodorkovsky, the former oil tycoon, said he has “not yet made any plans about permanent residency in Switzerland or anywhere else.”
abstract: Mikhail B Khodorkovsky, former oil tycoon freed after a decade in prison in Russia, arrives in Switzerland after leaving Berlin; Khodorkovsky's say he plans to oversee his teenage sons' return to school in Switzerland but has made no plans regarding permanent residency there or elsewhere.
lead_paragraph: A statement from aides to Mikhail B. Khodorkovsky, the former oil tycoon, said he has “not yet made any plans about permanent residency in Switzerland or anywhere else.”

headline.main: Freed Russian Oligarch Leaves Germany for Switzerland With Family
headline.print_headline: Freed Russian Oligarch Leaves Germany for Switzerland With Family
